title: Connect Four
description: First web game I ever created! Tackling the diagonal wins was the main challenge, but I also added scores, turn indicator, animation and own special design... click the image to have a go!

title: German Numbers
description: The objective was to treat the alert's input and assign it with words. I found a neat solution with a simple word array, and match the input to its index + 1... added a 'reset' button and animation just for fun. This was also the first time I embedded an external font! click the image to have a go!

title: Country Search
description: Incremental search in action, looping through an API and tackling mouse and keyboard events, hovering feedback and added 'clear' button... have a go!
